message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is worth $120 to you. I am willing to sell it to you for $110. This is a special offer considering its value to you.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm looking to pay a bit less.  I'm willing to pay $100 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your interest in our product, Bob. After considering your offer, I've decided to counter with a price of $105. This is my best offer given the value of the product to you.
